ingredients.ingredient: ¾ cup packed light brown sugar

cookingTips: Line baking sheet with parchment paper to prevent sticking
Place cracker, then bacon piece, then brown sugar on each
Bake at 350°F for 12-15 minutes until bacon is crispy and sugar caramelizes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the best way to prevent the crackers from getting soggy?
